about_the_game:
Enter the world of Zara, a confident and seductive tiefling with a sharp wit and a playful edge. This DLC adds Zara to Model Casting, offering her own storyline packed with playful banter, explicit encounters, and a longing for acceptance. Navigate her fiery personality and delve into her softer, vulnerable side as you guide her through a journey of passion and trust. Zara’s chapters promise heat, humor, and unforgettable moments.

Key Features:

  • Exclusive new character: Zara, a bold and seductive tiefling.

  • Three unique chapters: The Interview, Lewd Meeting, and Lewd Visit (Sandbox).

  • Unique H-scenes showcasing her fiery passion and playful charm.

  • Dialogue that balances confidence with heartfelt vulnerability.

  • Replayable explicit scenarios tailored to Zara’s fiery personality.

content_descriptors.notes:
Model Casting is an adult visual novel designed for mature audiences and features explicit sexual content, nudity, and strong language. Players interact with fictional characters in scenarios that include suggestive photoshoots, intimate dialogues, and consensual sexual encounters. All characters depicted in the game are 18 years or older.

The mature content is presented as part of the storyline and character development, focusing on consensual relationships and mutual respect. The game does not include depictions of sexual assault, non-consensual acts, extreme violence, self-harm, or drug/alcohol abuse. Instead, it aims to provide an immersive, character-driven experience that explores adult themes in a thoughtful and engaging manner.
